title: FRISCO\_REMIX, 34 designers in 1 font.
content:
**FRISCO\_REMIX. 34 DESIGNERS IN 1 FONT.   
AIGA SAN FRANCISCO PRESENTS "SPACED OUT. BLACK HOLES IN TYPOGRAPHY."   
HOLLAND FONTS/TRIBE03 ON-LINE.**      
   
--------------------   
   
 **[HOLLAND FONTS/TRIBE presents FRISCO\_REMIX,](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414183210/http:/www.hollandfonts.com/tribe/tribe03/repub/index.html)** 34 typeface designers, letter artists, illustrators and graphic designers in ONE font. Free until December 31, 2003 at [Holland Fonts.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414183210/http:/www.hollandfonts.com/)   
   
 [FRISCO\_REMIX,](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414183210/http:/www.hollandfonts.com/FRE03.html) produced by Max Kisman for Holland Fonts on the occasion of the AIGA event
author: MaxK
